languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс изгибает бровь.{/n} "Правильно ли я понимаю, что этим заявлением вы избавляете {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеноса{/g} от своего покровительства Вольного Торговца и препоручаете дальнейшую судьбу врага Человечества {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Священной Инквизиции{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс изгибает бровь.{/n} "Правильно ли я понимаю, что этим заявлением вы избавляете {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеноса{/g} от своего покровительства Вольного Торговца и препоручаете дальнейшую судьбу врага Человечества {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Священной Инквизиции{/g}?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}A furrow forms between Heinrix's brows.{/n} "By this declaration, if I understand correctly, you are stripping the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} of your protection as a Rogue Trader and delegating the fate of this enemy of Humanity to the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Holy Inquisition{/g}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс изгибает бровь.{/n} "Правильно ли я понимаю, что этим заявлением вы избавляете {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеноса{/g} от своего покровительства Вольного Торговца и препоручаете дальнейшую судьбу врага Человечества {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Священной Инквизиции{/g}?"

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A furrow forms between Heinrix's brows.{/n} "By this declaration, if I understand correctly, you are stripping the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} of your protection as a Rogue Trader and delegating the fate of this enemy of Humanity to the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Holy Inquisition{/g}?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希皱起了眉头。{/n}“如果我没理解错的话，你的意思是，你不再以行商浪人的身份保护这个{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}，而要将这个人类之敌交由{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}处置，是吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow forms between Heinrix's brows.{/n} "By this declaration, if I understand correctly, you are stripping the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} of your protection as a Rogue Trader and delegating the fate of this enemy of Humanity to the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Holy Inquisition{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希皱起了眉头。{/n}“如果我没理解错的话，你的意思是，你不再以行商浪人的身份保护这个{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}，而要将这个人类之敌交由{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}处置，是吗？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}A furrow forms between Heinrix's brows.{/n} "By this declaration, if I understand correctly, you are stripping the xenos of your protection as a Rogue Trader and delegating the fate of this enemy of Humanity to the Holy Inquisition?"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix frunce el entrecejo.{/n} «Con esta declaración, si la he entendido correctamente, está privando a la {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} de su protección como Comerciante Independiente y delegando el destino de esta enemiga de la Humanidad a la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Santa Inquisición{/g}. ¿Es así?».
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow forms between Heinrix's brows.{/n} "By this declaration, if I understand correctly, you are stripping the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} of your protection as a Rogue Trader and delegating the fate of this enemy of Humanity to the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Holy Inquisition{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix frunce el entrecejo.{/n} «Con esta declaración, si la he entendido correctamente, está privando a la {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} de su protección como Comerciante Independiente y delegando el destino de esta enemiga de la Humanidad a la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Santa Inquisición{/g}. ¿Es así?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは眉間にしわを寄せた。{/n}「私の理解が正しければ、あなたは自由開拓者としてこの{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の保護を剥奪し、この人類の敵の命運を、{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}聖なる異端審問庁{/g}へと委ねると宣言したとみなして構わないか？」
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow forms between Heinrix's brows.{/n} "By this declaration, if I understand correctly, you are stripping the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} of your protection as a Rogue Trader and delegating the fate of this enemy of Humanity to the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Holy Inquisition{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは眉間にしわを寄せた。{/n}「私の理解が正しければ、あなたは自由開拓者としてこの{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の保護を剥奪し、この人類の敵の命運を、{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}聖なる異端審問庁{/g}へと委ねると宣言したとみなして構わないか？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' Stirn legt sich in Falten.{/n} "Wenn ich das richtig verstehe, entzieht Ihr der {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} durch diese Erklärung Euren Schutz als {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} und delegiert das Schicksal dieser Feindin der Menschheit an die {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Heilige Inquisition{/g}?"
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow forms between Heinrix's brows.{/n} "By this declaration, if I understand correctly, you are stripping the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} of your protection as a Rogue Trader and delegating the fate of this enemy of Humanity to the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Holy Inquisition{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' Stirn legt sich in Falten.{/n} "Wenn ich das richtig verstehe, entzieht Ihr der {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} durch diese Erklärung Euren Schutz als {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} und delegiert das Schicksal dieser Feindin der Menschheit an die {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Heilige Inquisition{/g}?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un sillon se creuse entre les sourcils d'Heinrix.{/n} « Si je comprends bien, vous déclarez que la {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} ne bénéficie plus de votre protection de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} et que vous confiez le sort de cette ennemie de l'humanité à la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Sainte Inquisition{/g} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow forms between Heinrix's brows.{/n} "By this declaration, if I understand correctly, you are stripping the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} of your protection as a Rogue Trader and delegating the fate of this enemy of Humanity to the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Holy Inquisition{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sillon se creuse entre les sourcils d'Heinrix.{/n} « Si je comprends bien, vous déclarez que la {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} ne bénéficie plus de votre protection de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} et que vous confiez le sort de cette ennemie de l'humanité à la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Sainte Inquisition{/g} ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in kaşları çatılıyor.{/n} "Yanlış anlamıyorsam Hür Tacir olarak {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenoyu{/g} himayenden çıkardığını ve o İnsanlık düşmanını {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Kutsal Engizisyon'a{/g} havale ettiğini söylüyorsun."
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow forms between Heinrix's brows.{/n} "By this declaration, if I understand correctly, you are stripping the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} of your protection as a Rogue Trader and delegating the fate of this enemy of Humanity to the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Holy Inquisition{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in kaşları çatılıyor.{/n} "Yanlış anlamıyorsam Hür Tacir olarak {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenoyu{/g} himayenden çıkardığını ve o İnsanlık düşmanını {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Kutsal Engizisyon{/g}'a havale ettiğini söylüyorsun."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
